mapper.select: select id, to_char(date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as date, name, birthday, mobile_no, e_mail, gubun, service, foregin, area from counsels_counsel order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into counsels_counsel( created, modified, date, name, birthday, mobile_no, e_mail, gubun, service, foregin, area )values( now(), now(), now(), #{name}, #{birthday}, #{mobile_no}, #{e_mail}, #{gubun}, #{service}, #{foregin}, #{area} )
